txt.en: 'Now you understand, [placeholder].... Let us leave this memory.'
Observe Núrzum's meeting with his ally

You feel as if you can see Mossbeard's memories all around you.\n\nAs Mossbeard speaks, he describes a meeting between Núrzum and Saruman inside Drû Vádokan. Núrzum's past and his purpose in Wildermore are becoming more clear with each passing moment.

'The rest of my tale begins where Brúndoron fell... though since that tragic day, much time had passed and many more trees had fallen to shape the walls of their disgraceful camp.

'Hoom. It is clear now that Núrzum's ally was no better than those he harboured within these walls, though far more mighty.

'When you are ready, little one, I will tell you what I know of Núrzum and how he came to possess such a stone.'
Mossbeard wishes to tell you more of Núrzum's origins and the strange man who returned to the forest with him.
Mossbeard is standing outside of Drû Vádokan.\n\nMossbeard is ready to tell you more of Núrzum's origins. You should speak with him and listen to his tale.
